definition: to deceive/to cheat/to hoodwink/to make a wild guess
Mongol ethnic group/abbr. for Mongolia 蒙古國|蒙古国[Meng3 gu3 guo2]/Taiwan pr. [Meng2]
to cover/ignorant/to suffer (misfortune)/to receive (a favor)/to cheat
Ba state during Zhou dynasty (in east of modern Sichuan)/abbr. for east Sichuan or Chongqing/surname Ba/abbr. for Palestine or Palestinian/abbr. for Pakistan

to long for/to wish/to cling to/to stick to/sth that sticks/close to/next to/spread open/informal abbr. for bus 巴士[ba1 shi4]/bar (unit of pressure)/nominalizing suffix on certain nouns, such as 尾巴[wei3 ba5], tail

sentences.english: The sun shines on the empty seafront in Mombasa, Kenya.
sentences.chinese: 阳光明媚，肯尼亚蒙巴萨岛的海滩上却空无一人。

sentences.english: Port security in Aden and Mombasa has been stepped up.
sentences.chinese: 目前，亚丁海港和蒙巴萨港的安全措施已在逐步加强。

sentences.english: To supply to Mombasa port, Kenya.
sentences.chinese: 以供应给肯尼亚蒙巴萨港。

sentences.english: MOL in South Africa have confirmed they do not offer a service into Mombasa.
sentences.chinese: 南非MOL确认说他们没有去蒙巴萨岛的服务。

definition: Dar es Salaam (former capital of Tanzania)
pinyin: Da2 lei4 si1 Sa4 la1 mu3
